Question: What is a chatbot?
Answer: A chatbot (also known as a smartbot, conversational bot, chatterbot, interactive agent, conversational interface, Conversational AI, or artificial conversational entity) is a computer program or an artificial intelligence which conducts a conversation via auditory or textual methods. See more on the [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chatbot)
